charges.charge_disposition: Custody Bureau of Prisons for Life-this term consists of life on each Counts 1-4 to run concurrently with 5 years Supervised Release with it to run concurrently as to Counts 1-4 with defendant to participate in a program of testing and treatment for drug abuse as directed by the Probation Officer and $400.00 Special Assessment Fee. (1s)
